an4.166:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam patipada dukkha dandhabhinna, ayam, bhikkhave, patipada ubhayeneva hina akkhayati. Yampayam patipada dukkha, iminapayam hina akkhayati; yampayam patipada dandha, iminapayam hina akkhayati.
an4.166:2.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, patipada ubhayeneva hina akkhayati.
an4.166:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam patipada dukkha khippabhinna, ayam, bhikkhave, patipada dukkhatta hina akkhayati.
an4.166:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam patipada sukha dandhabhinna, ayam, bhikkhave, patipada dandhatta hina akkhayati.
an4.166:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam patipada sukha khippabhinna, ayam, bhikkhave, patipada ubhayeneva panita akkhayati. Yampayam patipada sukha, iminapayam panita akkhayati; yampayam patipada khippa, iminapayam panita akkhayati.
an4.166:5.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, patipada ubhayeneva panita akkhayati.
